Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Franc. Mazzola dip.   F. Rosaspina dis e inc./ LA BEATA VERGINE COL GESU BAMBINO,/ UN ANGELO, S. MARGHERITA, S. GIROLAMO, E S. AGOSTINO | in pencil on sheet: 2-40

title: The Blessed Virgin with Child Jesus, an Angel, St. Margaret. St. Jerome and St. Augustine
